name: deeper DEMO
description:
find the tapes; figure out what happened; save Claire Wright;

You find yourself in the childhood home of one Claire Wright, who has disappeared suddenly. Your goal is to figure out what has happened to her.
Scattered throughout the home are her recorded thoughts. You hope they will help you solve this mystery.
Beginning in the attic, as you venture deeper into the house, you learn that not all is what it seems-- the house grows ever more labyrinthine, ever stranger.
By the time you reach the basement, you find the house to be almost hostile to you-- but that's ridiculous, right?

this demo is the first level; the full game will be available summer 2019;
